Notes: Lays out the rough layout of a race minigame.

Path_arg7.Name: Goal Radius
Path_arg7.Description: The valid goal point range. Default is 650.

Point_arg0.Name: Requires Pass?
Point_arg0.Description: If set, this point needs to be passed by the player.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will appear when this switch is activated.

Rail.Description: Lays out the rough course of the race.

GeneralPos.Description: レース開始時マリオ位置 specifies the player's position at the start of the race.
